querySql: select DEVICE_ID,CONTEXT_ID,CITY,DATA_DATE,LOGIN_ACCOUNT,START_TIME,END_TIME from DWB_DA_APP_STATISTICS where DATA_DATE between '20181011' and '20181011' and CONTEXT_ID is not null and PAGE_ID in('HouseDetailViewController','com.house365.newhouse.ui.newhome.NewHouseDetailActivity','com.house365.newhouse.ui.newhome.NewHouseDetailActivity$14','NewHouseDetailViewController','com.house365.newhouse.ui.newhome.NewHouseRefectorActivity','newhouse_detail') and CONTEXT_ID like '_-%'
